io.github.msdk.util.tolerances

Class MaximumMzTolerance

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.msdk.util.tolerances.MaximumMzTolerance
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MzTolerance

    @Immutable
public class MaximumMzTolerance
extends Object
implements MzTolerance
    This class represents m/z tolerance. Tolerance is set using absolute (m/z) and relative (ppm) values. The tolerance range is calculated as the maximum of the absolute and relative values.
